metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42916 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 17.1.2 and iPadOS 17.1.2, macOS Sonoma 14.1.2, Safari17.1.2. Processing web content may disclose sensitive information. Apple isaware of a report that this issue may have been exploited against versionsof iOS before iOS 16.7.1.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
